title: The Essex Serpent one hundred and seventy-three

content.question: In the fourth sentence of the passage (“I moved . . . step”), the word “premeditated” indicates that the narrator

choices.label: has been out on the fire escape before
is considering doing something illegal or unethical
is being very cautious as he navigates the fire escape
is counting the steps as he climbs down the fire escape

content.answer: is being very cautious as he navigates the fire escape

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
